news.title: Dr. William Foege, leader in smallpox eradication, dies - ABC News
news.content: The 6-foot-7 inch Foege literally stood out in the field of public health.

news.title: Sean McVay on whether he expects Matthew Stafford back: "What the hell kind of question is that?" - NBC Sports
news.content: Said Stafford: "I can't generalize six months of my life ten minutes after a loss."

news.title: Iran Is Selling More Oil but Making Less Money - The Wall Street Journal
news.content: Middlemen and buyers take advantage of embattled regime’s limited options for unloading crude

news.title: Inside Apple’s AI Shake-Up and Its Plans for Two New Versions of Siri - Bloomberg.com
news.content: Apple shakes up its AI efforts with a Google partnership, management changes and two new versions of Siri. Also: The company gets ready to kick off its 2026 Mac launches and puts CEO candidate John Ternus in charge of design.
